channel.title: Your snow men :)
channel.description:
Well, I made this topic because its snowing alot in the UK, so therefore i want to see some of your snow men? :D
Mine got destroyed. :(

item.title: Your snow men :)
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Since I only saw 1 snowman and the majority of the posts are pretty much spam and flame, I shall lock this. Way too much potential to develop into something worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Your snow men :)
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

How the hell did rep become a part of this discussion? You gave a snowman a penis. You made this snowman’ s penis with two older men. You came to a forum and posted a picture of this snowman thinking people would say it’ s funny. You thought wrong.

/end, at least for your posts.

Read full topic

item.title: Your snow men :)
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=flj0yter0p link=topic=469985.msg3436416#msg3436416 date=1292791791]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=469985.msg3436412#msg3436412 date=1292791675]
@n10si I don’t see what you mean I was asking a question…

@flj0yter0p Not enough females to model it from?
[/quote]No material for hair, eyes and other stuff left.
[/quote]So, instead of taking one of the 8 bottlecaps, which weren’t needed, and saying you couldn’t find another rag (the hair does look like a rag) you decide to say you had no materials to make one, and leave it at a homosexual state?[/quote]The rag wasn’t meant to be hair actualy, we wanted him to look like that ali baba dude. bottlecaps were good for his costume.

Incase you still think i’m a 12yo brat who thinks a penis is funny

And for fucks sake dude… how can a snowman not have a penis? don’t you have one?

Read full topic
